description:
An icon beside the date in the topbar to show if there are unread emails when running your default email client.

 It checks the notifications in the message tray related to a new mail, no extra configuration needed, very light extension. Do not disable the notifications of your default email client ! *** It is not a standalone mail checker, you need your email client to be running. *** Please check that the xdg-utils package is installed.

 Email clients supported at the moment are : Thunderbird, Evolution, Geary, Mailspring. Please ask to add the client you need. If you report an error, please provide at least the distribution and the email client you use through the github link.
name: New Mail Indicator
